ValidationRule.description: This enforces any sort of conditions you may want on the Static Code Analysis results of a User Story (i.e. whether they have to be run and/or achieve certain results). What is written here is that the SCA Score cannot be blank or greater than zero.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( copado__Has_Apex_Code__c = true, OR( AND( PRIORVALUE(copado__Promote_Change__c) = false, copado__Promote_Change__c = true ), AND( PRIORVALUE(copado__Promote_and_Deploy__c) = false, copado__Promote_and_Deploy__c = true ) ), OR( ISBLANK( SCA_Score__c ), SCA_Score__c > 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Static Code Analysis has either not been run or the SCA Score is too high.
